776.text:
To make a ganache, use some chocolate and

780.text:

785.text: Stir it well, then microwave for 30 seconds.

789.text:
And now it should be really melted so keep

794.text: the chocolate until it's nice and smooth.

873.text:
So what happens with the wind is if you join

877.text:
these sort of slide games, usually everything
falls down from the top.

882.text:
But in this one it doesn't necessarily do
that.

884.text: It will fall the way that you have swiped.

See there we have a line of 2 pairs and I'll

892.text:
all the little cropsies, fill up from the

899.text:
So if I swipe up from the bottom on the water
here, you'll see the cropsies come up from

901.text: the bottom instead of from the side.

908.text:
The other thing is with the squirrel and the
acorn, to get them together you need to get

912.text:
rid of the stuff that's in between the two

914.text:
So if we swipe down with that plum, that will

917.text: tail and gets rid of the acorn.

920.text: So that's quite easy for you to do.

925.text:
The one thing I do like about this game as

927.text:
if you still have moves left, you get to use

930.text: So that helps you get extra points.

939.text:
